org.platanios.learn.optimization.function

Class QuadraticFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.platanios.learn.optimization.function.AbstractFunction
      • org.platanios.learn.optimization.function.QuadraticFunction

  • public final class QuadraticFunction
extends AbstractFunction
    A quadratic function of the form \(f(x)=\frac{1}{2}x^TAx-b^Tx\).
    Author:
    Emmanouil Antonios Platanios
